tool_description: Creates personalized communication content for donors using templates, donor-specific data, and customizable messaging strategies to enhance engagement.

template_id.description: Identifier for the message template to personalize

donor_segment_id.description: Identifier for the donor segment to personalize content for

personalization_fields.description: List of donor fields to use for personalization (e.g., first_name, last_gift_amount, preferred_program)

content_type.description: Type of content to generate: email, letter, social_post, or invitation

tone.description: Communication tone: formal, casual, grateful, or urgent

include_giving_history.description: Whether to include donor's giving history in personalization

call_to_action.description: Specific call-to-action to include in the content

max_content_length.description: Maximum character length for generated content

error_messages: Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid segment: The donor_segment_id is not valid or contains no donors.
Missing personalization data: One or more personalization_fields lack data for significant portion of donors.
Invalid content type: content_type must be one of: email, letter, social_post, invitation.
Invalid tone: tone must be one of: formal, casual, grateful, urgent.
Content length exceeded: Generated content exceeds max_content_length limit.
usage: Specify template_id, donor_segment_id, personalization_fields, and content_type. Optionally customize tone, include_giving_history, call_to_action, and max_content_length. Returns personalized content for each donor in the segment.

content_generated.description: Number of personalized content pieces created

personalization_success_rate.description: Percentage of donors for whom content was successfully personalized

average_content_length.description: Average character length of generated content

content_preview.description: Sample of personalized content for review

personalization_summary.description: Summary of personalization process and key insights
